fr.ybo.csvengine
Class CsvEngine

java.lang.Object
  fr.ybo.csvengine.CsvEngine

public class CsvEngine
extends Object

Engine to write and read CSV File.
Examples of use :

  • Construction of the engine :
    CsvEngine engine = new CsvEngine(CsvObject.class);
  • Read a CSV File :
    List<CsvObject> objects = engine.parseInputStream(stream, CsvObject.class);
  • Write a CSV File :
    engine.writeFile(new FileWriter(file), objects, CsvObject.class);


French : Moteur de lecture et Ã©criture de fichier CSV.
Voici des exemple d'utilisation :

  • Construction du moteur :
    CsvEngine moteur = new CsvEngine(CsvObject.class);
  • Lecture d'un fichier CSV :
    List<CsvObject> objets = moteur.parseInputStream(stream, CsvObject.class);
  • Ecriture d'un fichier CSV :
    moteur.writeFile(new FileWriter(file), objets, CsvObject.class);

Author:
ybonnel

Method Detail

setFactory

public void setFactory(CsvManagerFactory factory)
This method can be call to use an other implementation than open-csv for read and write of CSV File.

Parameters:
factory - factory which deliver CsvReader and CsvWriter.

parseInputStream

public <T> Result<T> parseInputStream(InputStream inputStream,
                                      Class<T> clazz)
                           throws CsvErrorsExceededException
Parse an InputStream representing a CSV File to transform it in a list of .

Type Parameters:
T - Class associated to the CSV.
Parameters:
inputStream - inputStream representing the CSV File.
clazz - class associated to the CSV File.
Returns:
the list of representing all rows of the CSV File.
Throws:
CsvErrorsExceededException - if the number of errors occurred exceed the accepted number EngineParameters.getNbLinesWithErrorsToStop().

Parse a CSV File with an handler on each row.

Type Parameters:
T - The class associated to the CSV File.
Parameters:
reader - a Reader which represent the CSV File.
clazz - class associated to the CSV File.
